adDetails: About me : My name is Ashley, I am a licensed cosmetologist and an assistant.. I'm currently undergoing an advanced training at Keter salon in Berkeley. I will be guided by my mentors with decades of experience and training. There is a small service fee $12 for models What I am looking for: long layers Appointment times available are 4 & 6 pm Monday the 16th. Service includes free shampoo, cut, and blowdry. If interested please respond with current hair length, texture, and a photo if possible Also check us out on YELP 4 Time winner for best salon in the EAST BAY.
